page.topic: Getting Started with Alpha Anywhere - Basic Tutorials
page.description: These basic tutorials provide step-by-step instructions for creating some of the core elements required for any mobile or web application. This includes creating new workspaces and connection strings, configure the Development Server, and how to test your application using some of the tools available in Alpha Anywhere.

group.title: Important Notice for Community Edition Users

description.p: These tutorials were built using the full Alpha Anywhere Development Environment. Some tutorials may not apply due to features that are not available in Community Edition. Community Edition users may encounter screens that don't match their environment due to differences between the two development environments.
We strongly recommend starting with the tutorials in the *[extlink:Alpha Software Learning Center@https://learn.alphasoftware.com]* to start learning Alpha Anywhere.
